BudgetReport.py.name: FileHandler
BudgetReport.py.doc: Class to handle file selection and directory management.

methods.name: get_file_path_and_name
methods.doc: Opens a file dialog and returns the selected file path and name.

BudgetReport.py.name: DataProcessor
BudgetReport.py.doc: Class to handle reading, cleaning, and transforming the data.

methods.name: read_data
methods.doc: Reads the DAT file into a DataFrame.

methods.name: process_wbs
methods.doc: Classifies WBS elements into summary and transaction WBS dynamically.

BudgetReport.py.name: ExcelFormatter
BudgetReport.py.doc: Class to handle Excel file formatting.

methods.name: apply_freeze_panes
methods.doc: Freeze panes for the Excel sheet.

methods.name: apply_font_style
methods.doc: Apply a font style to all cells in the worksheet.

methods.name: apply_currency_formatting
methods.doc: Apply currency formatting to specific columns.

methods.name: create_table
methods.doc: Create a table in the worksheet from data range.

methods.name: apply_header_format
methods.doc: Apply specific formatting to the header cells.

methods.name: highlight_rows_by_value
methods.doc:
For each cell in column 'D', if the cell's value is in values_list,
highlight the entire row with a yellow fill.

Parameters:
self.worksheet          : openpyxl worksheet object
values_list : list of values to check against

methods.name: save
methods.doc: Save the final formatted workbook.

BudgetVariance.py.name: DataProcessor
BudgetVariance.py.doc: Handles data reading, cleaning, and transformation.

methods.name: clean_data
methods.doc: Removes the first two lines from the HTML file and saves it as a cleaned version.

methods.name: read_data
methods.doc: Reads the cleaned HTML into a Pandas DataFrame.

methods.name: transform_data
methods.doc: Processes WBS elements and updates descriptions.

methods.name: process_wbs
methods.doc: Classifies WBS elements into summary and transaction WBS.

methods.name: apply_formatting
methods.doc: Applies all formatting options to the Excel file.

methods.name: highlight_summary_wbs
methods.doc: Highlight entire row and column for summary WBS.

methods.name: apply_header_format
methods.doc: Applies header formatting and removes '1' from column headers ending with '1'.

GlimpsOfProjects.py.name: ProjectDataProcessor
GlimpsOfProjects.py.doc: Handles extraction, processing, and reporting of project data.

methods.name: get_file_path_and_name
methods.doc: Opens a file dialog and returns the selected file path and name.

methods.name: extract_project_data
methods.doc: Extracts project data from the given DAT file.

methods.name: generate_cross_tab
methods.doc: Generates a cross-tab report from project data.

GlimpsOfProjects.py.name: ExcelStyler
GlimpsOfProjects.py.doc: Handles styling and chart creation in the Excel report.

methods.name: apply_styling
methods.doc: Applies formatting and colors to the Excel report.

methods.name: add_data_validation
methods.doc: Adds data validation dropdown for company selection.

methods.name: add_dynamic_reference_section
methods.doc: Adds a section below the cross-tab table to dynamically reference the selected company's data.

methods.name: add_chart
methods.doc: Adds a dynamic 3D Bar Chart to the Excel sheet.

methods.name: save_workbook
methods.doc: Saves the workbook.

methods.name: run_module
methods.doc: Runs the given module's `main()` function safely.

methods.name: center_window
methods.doc: Centers the application window on the screen.

methods.name: init_ui
methods.doc: Initializes the user interface and creates buttons.

methods.name: run_module
methods.doc:
Runs the specified module if it has a 'main' function.
Args:
    module: Python module to be executed.
